name: Retro Space Invaders
description:
Features and how to play:
- Classic arcade game with retro graphics features like CRT screen.
- Touch left or right to move your space ship.
- Several screen pad configurations to control the ship, 2 with autofire and 1 without autofire. With manual fire you can get a slightly higher shoting rate.
- Destroy the ufo and get powers to have advantage: Extra points, firepower and up aliens.
- Each stage has four levels. Once you pass a stage, the game begins again but the difficulty is increased.
- Destroy the maximum of alien invaders to increase your score.
- Extra life at 5,000 and every 10,000
- Optionally you can share your total score and achievements with friends or the rest of the world.

Enjoy space invaders arcade games again, now on your mobile or tablet!
